SELECT p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, p.price, p.rating, p.category, p.description, b.type AS baumann_type FROM product p JOIN baumann b ON p.baumann_id = b.baumann_id WHERE (p.prd_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR p.prd_brand LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR p.ingredient LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR b.type LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') and deleted_at is null
AND p.prd_brand = #{filter_brand}
AND p.category = #{filter_category}
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
ORDER BY p.created_at ASC
ORDER BY p.rating DESC
ORDER BY p.rating ASC
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
